ComicInfo.Summary: The Troyjan War Part 3: Jammin': Hulk and Silver Surfer are picked up in space by the Starjammers and head toward the Troyjan homeworld. Trauma captures the Pantheon and returns home to his father. Things get complicated as Lord Armageddon explains that he is the power behind Pantheon leader Agamemnon and if Atalanta refuses to marry his son, he will rescind the longevity he has granted to the Pantheon members and they will be destroyed. Meanwhile, back on Earth, Janis meets Rick.
